description: This vintage cafe on wheels brings an element of class and folksy charisma (not to mention a wonderful selection of wine, beer, cocktails, and hand-crafted coffee beverages) to any occasion. Living up to the name “Ahimsa”, which means “nonviolence to myself and all living things”, this team exclusively serves Venice Beach’s own Groundwork Coffee, which is 100% organic, fair trade, non-GMO, chemical-free, so you can enjoy every sip knowing that this brew actually benefits the community. Whether you wish to refresh your guests with libations from a bar, or with delicious coffee, simply call on Ahimsa Caravan Cafe to cater to your needs, and turn your ideal event into a reality.
name: Ahimsa Caravan Cafe
